headline: North America Plywood Market Forecast and Company Analysis Report 2025-2033 Featuring Boise Cascade, Weyerhaeuser, West Fraser Timber, BlueLinx, PotlatchDeltic, South Coast Lumber, Hood Industry, and RoyOMartin
summary: The North America plywood market is projected to grow from US$ 16.82 billion in 2024 to US$ 23.37 billion by 2033, exhibiting a CAGR of 3.72%. This expansion is driven by increased government spending, technological advancements, and the demand for eco-friendly building materials. Green certifications and production innovations further boost market share. Significant infrastructural investments and urbanization stimulate plywood usage in residential and commercial sectors.
